description_carte: Aries, once a symbol of courage, now a monstrous ram consumed by infernal flames and driven by wrath.
description_visuelle: A massive, charred ram engulfed in black flames. Its horns are broken and twisted, and its eyes glow with malevolent red light. Ash constantly falls from its fur.

skills.name: Infernal Charge
skills.description: Aries charges forward, wreathed in flames, dealing heavy damage to the target.

skills.name: Burning Fury
skills.description: Aries unleashes a wave of fire around him, damaging all nearby enemies.

skills.name: Blighted Breath
skills.description: Aries exhales a cloud of toxic fumes, poisoning the target and reducing their defense.

skills.name: Wrathful Rampage
skills.description: Aries enters a state of uncontrollable rage, greatly increasing his attack and speed for a short duration.

skills.name: Cinder Coat
skills.description: Aries hardens his burning fur, reducing incoming damage.
